sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ServiceMappingAjaxUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ServiceMappingAjaxUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ServiceMappingAjaxUtils = Class.create();
ServiceMappingAjaxUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getMappingLevelForServiceTable: function() {
        var rec = new GlideRecord('service_table_config');
        rec.addQuery('service_table', this.getParameter('sysparm_service_table'));
        rec.query();

        if (rec.next()) {
            return rec.getValue("mapping_level");
        }

        return "";
    },

    type: 'ServiceMappingAjaxUtils'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-15 13:44:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>085d06ada311311013c5265765fcda2f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ServiceMappingAjaxUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Portfolio Management Foundation" source="com.snc.service_portfolio">9fe738ac3cb1311068bcf327dfe37ff1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_085d06ada311311013c5265765fcda2f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-03 02:39:08</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
